caption.p: Effects of Inulae Flos extract (IFE) on HCl/ethanol-induced gastric ulcers in rats. Representative gross images of stomachs of ( a) control, ( b) Stillen 300 mg/kg, ( c) IFE 100 mg/kg, and ( d) IFE 300 mg/kg groups. Rats were treated with distilled water, IFE (100 or 300 mg/kg), or Stillen (300 mg/kg) 1 h prior to the administration of HCl/ethanol.
